1.title: Coincept
1.subtitle: DeFi ‚Ä¢ Community-driven idea market
1.description: Coincept is a community-driven idea market where curators drop ideas, traders bet on them, builders build them, and token holders vote. If the idea hits, fees go to the winning build and the curator. Basically, everyone wins when the idea bangs.
1.longDescription: Coincept is a community-driven idea market where curators drop ideas, traders bet on them, builders build them, and token holders vote. If the idea hits, fees go to the winning build and the curator. Basically, everyone wins when the idea bangs.

2.title: HandShake
2.subtitle: DeFi ‚Ä¢ Gasless token transfer protocol
2.description: HandShake is a gasless, secure token and NFT transfer protocol ensuring mutual consent through double confirmation using EIP-712 standard for enhanced security and clarity. It implements flexible gas payment options allowing sender, recipient, or third-party payment, with sponsored transaction model for free transfers through promotional content engagement.
2.longDescription: HandShake is a gasless, secure token and NFT transfer protocol ensuring mutual consent through double confirmation using EIP-712 standard for enhanced security and clarity. It implements flexible gas payment options allowing sender, recipient, or third-party payment, with sponsored transaction model for free transfers through promotional content engagement.

3.title: CirclePay
3.subtitle: Web3 ‚Ä¢ Gasless USDC transfers
3.description: Send USDC without having ETH or without having gas tokens, let the receiver or someone else to pay for the transfer!
3.longDescription: Send USDC without having ETH or without having gas tokens, let the receiver or someone else to pay for the transfer!

4.title: DropZone
4.subtitle: DeFi ‚Ä¢ Decentralized airdrop platform
4.description: DropZone is a decentralized airdrop campaign platform enabling secure and transparent token distribution with automated campaign management and verification systems.
4.longDescription: DropZone is a decentralized airdrop campaign platform enabling secure and transparent token distribution with automated campaign management and verification systems.

5.title: DualSign
5.subtitle: DeFi ‚Ä¢ Dual-signature security protocol
5.description: DualSign is a dual-signature security protocol for enhanced transaction verification and multi-party approval systems in blockchain applications.
5.longDescription: DualSign is a dual-signature security protocol for enhanced transaction verification and multi-party approval systems in blockchain applications.

6.title: FluidPay
6.subtitle: DeFi ‚Ä¢ Superfluid pay-as-you-go
6.description: Fluidpay is a superfluid protocol-powered pay-as-you-go project where platforms can register on the blockchain and obtain unique QR codes for transactions. When someone scans the QR code, they can effortlessly start or end a payment stream. This innovative model ensures users only pay for the time they have used the service, while platforms are freed from the hassle of tracking usage time, making payments seamless and efficient.
6.longDescription: Fluidpay is a superfluid protocol-powered pay-as-you-go project where platforms can register on the blockchain and obtain unique QR codes for transactions. When someone scans the QR code, they can effortlessly start or end a payment stream. This innovative model ensures users only pay for the time they have used the service, while platforms are freed from the hassle of tracking usage time, making payments seamless and efficient.

7.title: BasedJack
7.subtitle: Social ‚Ä¢ Farcaster blackjack game
7.description: BasedJack is a fun and engaging blackjack game integrated into Farcaster and Warpcast, eliminating boredom by bringing casino excitement right to your feed. It features Nouns-themed gameplay, leaderboards to track your win streaks and achievements, and seamless in-app play.
7.longDescription: BasedJack is a fun and engaging blackjack game integrated into Farcaster and Warpcast, eliminating boredom by bringing casino excitement right to your feed. It features Nouns-themed gameplay, leaderboards to track your win streaks and achievements, and seamless in-app play.

8.title: Uniswap-clone
8.subtitle: DeFi ‚Ä¢ AMM DEX implementation
8.description: I have worked on creating a Uniswap clone, where I gained a deep understanding of both V2 and V3 contracts. I successfully deployed these contracts and the associated subgraphs, and I connected the contracts with the interface. Through this project, I also mastered many DeFi concepts, AMM, Concentrated liquidity(CLAMM) various Solidity coding standards, front-end coding standards, and was introduced to industry-level code.
8.longDescription: I have worked on creating a Uniswap clone, where I gained a deep understanding of both V2 and V3 contracts. I successfully deployed these contracts and the associated subgraphs, and I connected the contracts with the interface. Through this project, I also mastered many DeFi concepts, AMM, Concentrated liquidity(CLAMM) various Solidity coding standards, front-end coding standards, and was introduced to industry-level code.

9.title: ChainQ
9.subtitle: AI ‚Ä¢ Blockchain data querying
9.description: ChainQ simplifies accessing blockchain data by using AI-driven Natural Language Processing, making it easy for entrepreneurs, marketers, and researchers to extract pertinent information without deep technical knowledge. Through this project, I learned about AI, Python, Node API, SQLite, and utilized various question-answering AI models, enhancing my skills in these areas while democratizing blockchain technology for broader use.
9.longDescription: ChainQ simplifies accessing blockchain data by using AI-driven Natural Language Processing, making it easy for entrepreneurs, marketers, and researchers to extract pertinent information without deep technical knowledge. Through this project, I learned about AI, Python, Node API, SQLite, and utilized various question-answering AI models, enhancing my skills in these areas while democratizing blockchain technology for broader use.

10.title: Superfluid developer dashboard
10.subtitle: Dev-tooling ‚Ä¢ Superfluid development console
10.description: This project helps superfluid developers to run the superfluid contracts on their local machine (with hardhat) and helps them easily create/update/delete/distribute token stream, also added feature is your local transaction will be recorded and with one command you can re run that again making the development and testing so much easy for superfluid developers (also received 1st priceüèÜ for this)
10.longDescription: This project helps superfluid developers to run the superfluid contracts on their local machine (with hardhat) and helps them easily create/update/delete/distribute token stream, also added feature is your local transaction will be recorded and with one command you can re run that again making the development and testing so much easy for superfluid developers (also received 1st priceüèÜ for this)
